hero.title: KAECZEN
hero.tagline: Computational Design & AI Solutions for AEC
hero.description: Transforming the AEC industry through computational design, automation, and artificial intelligence technology.

about.title: About Kaeczen
about.description: Kaeczen is a technology consultancy specializing in computational design, software development, and artificial intelligence integration for the AEC (Architecture, Engineering, and Construction) industry.
about.experience: With over 14 years of experience in parametric design and high-complexity geometric projects, our mission is to help AEC companies modernize their workflows through automation and AI tools.
about.operations: We operate internationally, offering remote consulting services for companies seeking to transform their design and construction processes.

computational.title: Computational & Parametric Design
computational.description: Specialized in Rhinoceros and Grasshopper workflows for design automation, geometric optimization, and digital fabrication.
items: Custom plugin and component development in C# and Python
Complex geometry and form-finding with Kangaroo Physics

bim.title: BIM Automation & Interoperability
bim.description: Seamless integration between design tools and BIM platforms to optimize workflows in construction projects.
items: Speckle for collaboration and data interoperability
BIM process automation with Dynamo and Revit APIs
Automated quality control in BIM models

web.title: Web Development & Parametric Applications
web.description: Creation of web applications that allow end clients to interact with parametric designs without technical knowledge.
items: Web applications with React, Three.js, and WebGL
Integration with Rhino.Compute for cloud calculations

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence Integration
ai.description: Pioneers in AI integration for automation of architectural design processes and software development.
items: Development with Claude Code and Cursor IDE for 10x productivity
AI agents for architectural design assistance
MCP (Model Context Protocol) for AI-CAD connection

product.title: Featured Product: Grasshopper MCP
product.description: We have developed a pioneering integration that connects Claude AI directly with Grasshopper through the Model Context Protocol (MCP). This tool allows controlling parametric designs through natural language.
capabilities: Create components (sliders, panels, points, numbers, booleans)
Search components by name or type
product.example_quote: "Create a slider from 0 to 100 and connect it to a circle's radius" â€” and watch it happen instantly.
use_cases: Educational tools for teaching parametric design

consulting.title: Technical Consulting
consulting.description: Strategic advisory to implement computational design and automation technologies in your organization. We evaluate your current workflows and propose tailored solutions.

development.title: Custom Tool Development
development.description: We create plugins, scripts, and applications specific to your needs: from Grasshopper components to complete web applications with 3D visualization.
items: Python and C# scripts for Rhino/Revit

training.title: Training & Education
training.description: Training programs in Grasshopper, data structures, Python, Rhino.Inside Revit, and AI tools. Courses adapted to all levels, from beginners to advanced professionals.

configurators.title: 3D Configurators & E-commerce
configurators.description: Development of web platforms where your clients can customize products in 3D, view real-time renders, and place orders. Ideal for parametric furniture, facades, and architectural products.

projects.title: Featured Projects
items: 5+ ShapeDiver applications deployed serving 10,000+ end users
Parametric platform combining Rhino.Compute with Claude API
Structural optimization tool reducing calculation times from hours to minutes
Automated BIM quality control systems accessible via web
E-commerce solutions for architectural components and parametric furniture

experience.title: Proven Experience
experience.description: Over 14 years of experience in computational design and high-complexity geometric projects in the AEC sector.

innovation.title: Constant Innovation
innovation.description: Pioneers in AI integration with CAD tools. We develop proprietary products like Grasshopper MCP that define the future of the industry.

solutions.title: End-to-End Solutions
solutions.description: From strategic consulting to software development and training. A single partner for all your digital transformation needs.

reach.title: International Reach
reach.description: We operate remotely with clients worldwide. Schedule flexibility and communication in English and Spanish.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Interested in transforming your workflows with computational design and AI? Contact us for a free initial consultation.
